DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
This card can trigger #bSunfire, and gain #yMagicPower .
This card can trigger #rEclipse, and gain #yMagicPower .
This card can trigger Both #bSunfire and #rEclipse.
This card can trigger Both #bSunfire and #rEclipse.
Include #bSunfire and #rEclipse, you have at least #b10 MagicPower when be in Equilibrium.
Ignore several Block of monsters when Attack.
At end of your turn, Gain Block according to amount of MagicPower.
When you Gain MagicPower for some times, Gain additional Strength.
Every time you played a #yAttack card this turn, this enemy will receive additional damage as amount of this power.
This Blessing will give you #yStrength, and #yExhaust when you get HP Loss to reduce #b50% Loss.
When you #yAttack this monster, Gain #yBlock as many as mark's amount. NL You can keep this power by cause at least #b10 damage in 1 turn.
All damage taken is reduced to #b0 .
